column2: an A.M. Eatery////This is literally the best brunch I've ever had. Yes parking is horrible and you need to plan to wait over an hour
column3: BUT IT'S SO WORTH IT. We had the Benny Duo: one with pulled pork and the other was the prosciutto and arugula and both were amazing! I loved being able to try both. We also split the pancake trio with chocolate chip
column5: and the "pancake of the day" which had corn
column8: and jalape√±o. I am so sad this is not a standard menu item because it was delicious!!!! We will absolutely be back to try more! I hope they open more locations soon!
